channel.title: How Do I Change Words When You Login
channel.description:
How Do I Change Words When You Login, i mean when i log in on my server has a screen that pops up and tells latest change and all.It Say server created by w1k3d.... how do i change that
Second thing when i login it says in chatbox server created by w1k3d and the forums site. How do i change this?

item.title: How Do I Change Words When You Login
item.dc:creator: @Elvemage_0o Elvemage 0o
item.description:
@Elvemage_0o wrote:

search this in client.java

if (playerRights == 0) {

should be the second one down from top

change what the text says

compile and run

Read full topic
